Text:
Will…if you have downloaded it you will find an compressed file (pc_check_tuning_2011_6_0_402_1045), try to write click it and Extract with  WinRAR, then you get  2 exe files:-
   pc_check_tuning_2011_6_0_402_1045 and update.exe
update.exe is a Trojan-Spy.Zbot!IK, any way the main program appears to be clean,so if 
you MUST !!! install it ,extract and install the main program, but I do not recommends it, 
find another program, be safe………
